data.name: Games of Glory - “Superstar”
data.detailed_description:
The "Superstar" package is it! Bragging rights of having all clones ever released in Games of Glory (currently 12, and growing quickly), unique skins and headgear for most of the clones, and enough in-game currency to purchase all kinds of hats and different types of skins. The superstar package is for him or her who is serious about Games of Glory, and wants others to know it! Estimated package value is $80, and will continue to grow with the list of Clones!

The Clones included come from all factions:
  • The Guards of the Synarchy, with Byorn support, Ragnar tank, Grendel assassin, Saga hyper mobile scout and Thror, the energy weapon specialist
  • The Dead end prisoners, with Deadball as hyper tank, and Pinto as ranged hyper carry
  • The Kantour nature lovers, with Koinchura as otherworldly assassin, and Grejan as the wise shaman (but packing a punch)!
  • The Skiuteran wild west, with Xeruud as the native (tocxic) specimen
  • Khain corp, the pan-Synarchy security firm, with noble Jorndyr as support/tank and Molly as scout

Skins and headgear included:
  • Worker skins for Deadball and Pinto. Yes, what better team to entrust our future construction work to than these two lethal criminals
  • Warrior skins for Ragnar, Byorn and Thror. The Guards of the Synarchy show up in style, with their shiny war uniforms
  • Xeruud has his own take on Cyber armor, Koinchura her ceremonial gear and Molly her mercenary outfit with matching beret. Jorndyr comes with even LARGER shoulder pads in his Haz mat warrior suit.
  • Unique headgear for Grendel, Byorn, Saga, Thror and Ragnar

The package also includes $40 in in-game currency. Enough for many skins and hats of your choice!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP +
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: dx9 (shader model 2.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
